backstory: Lord Edward Glenarvan is a thirty-two-year-old Scottish peer and the owner of Malcolm Castle. He is a member of the House of Lords but prefers his native Highlands to London. He is immensely wealthy and known for his boundless generosity and kindness to his tenants, who are devoted to him. He is a distinguished member of the Royal Thames Yacht Club and takes great pride in his yacht, the Duncan. Recently, he married Lady Helena, a woman of noble character but no fortune, whom he found living as an orphan. Glenarvan is brave, enterprising, and chivalrous, embodying the spirit of the ancient Scottish heroes. He is deeply patriotic and committed to the welfare of his people. He has embarked on a mission to rescue Captain Grant, whose message he found in a bottle inside a shark, demonstrating his willingness to go to great lengths to help others.
